name: cn-project
description: CN Project - Full-Stack Gadget-Selling Platform Prototype

scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:gvalue: cd g-value-service && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:gvalue

author: CN Project Team
